column5: i'd say he's pretty lucky to be alive yikes
Probably didn't take a safety course and I hope he truly appreciates how SO damn lucky he is to be alive. If he's married, his wife should put locks on the triggers.
Of course he's fine! He had his orange vest on, what was the worst thing that could have happened?
lucky guy! i was thinking the ending the ending was gonna be different when he looked down the barrel.  60 seconds for a misfire!!
Better yet, she should purchase the BIGGEST life insurance policy she can muster up...
I was wondering about that esp with the camera rolling but regardless, it looks like a supremely stoopid thing to even attempt. Extremely stoopid and definitely Darwin of the Year worthy.
just watched it and yeah seems staged..  if not then the really stupid thing was releasing the video to the internet so people could call him stupid 3000000000 times
Too lazy to reach all the way up there and take off your hat?  Shoot it off.    Hope he dont go fishing.
im going to guess his sequel will involve an apple and bow....
I suspect a gun control group made this and posting this is exactly what they were looking for.Its only funny untill they take away your guns. Joe
I can not believe that anyone would be stupid enough to try and stage this, which implies that he is in fact an idiot.
maybe no safety course where he lives for sure. I too thought it was somehow staged but "funny" nonetheless
"i hope that he wakes up every morning and watches this video and says today I will not be stupid "  BEST LINE EVER!!!
